New Records: Bolivia achieved a win at the highest altitude stadium in international football history during the match.
Key Match Events: Ramiro Vaca scored the opening goal in the 13th minute with a long-range shot.
Carmelo Algara√±az doubled the lead with a penalty before halftime.
Miguel Terceros and Enzo Monteiro scored in the second half to secure the win.
Pre-Game Insights: The match was held at the Municipal de El Alto stadium, one of the world's highest altitude venues.
Bolivia utilized their home advantage effectively, with over 20,000 fans in attendance.
Post-Match Reflections: The win moved Bolivia into seventh place in the qualifiers, provisionally securing a spot in international playoffs.
Coach Oscar Villegas earned his first victory since taking over the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was Bolivia's first home game at the El Alto stadium in La Paz.
The game was part of the 2026 World Cup Qualifying - CONMEBOL tournament.
